title: Resort Style Swimming Pool, Flexible Lease Terms Available
posting_body: Want more info on this unit?
Capri North and South Apartments in Las Vegas, NV
This is a 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 990 Sq.
Capri North and South Apartments are a beautiful, pet-friendly community that offers one, two and three bedroom apartment homes.
These spacious residences feature fireplaces, oversized garden tubs, large walk-in closets, washers and dryers and covered parking.
Take advantage of our community amenities by relaxing in our resort-style swimming pool or getting in a good workout in our state-of-the-art fitness center.
Capri North and South are conveniently located near I-95 and Sunset Park and is minutes away from McCarran International Airport, UNLV, and other dining and shopping areas.
- Digital Cable and Internet Included in Every Unit
Prices are subject to change, based on availability and qualification of the applicant, additional fees may apply.
